pr_title: docs: update beta CP dependencies for 0.11.0 (MINOR)

timeline.message: docs: update beta CP dependencies for 0.11.0

timeline.bodyText: Hey @JimGalasyn I couldn't discern the pattern regarding which variables are named version and which are named release. Should this new variable be named release instead?
timeline.author: vcrfxia

replies.bodyText: I was trying to follow the pattern from the main CP doc set: https://github.com/confluentinc/docs/blob/887c6bcf2ff152c23e836dd8f653da691a5247c3/conf.py#L214. I added the "ksqldb" variable to be specific to the Standalone distro, so it could be ksqldbcprelease if you like, but I'm fine with this as-is.
replies.author: JimGalasyn
